m_szDocTitle: News:2011:October-December:Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies - PESWiki
m_szDocSumamry: News:2011:October-December:Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies From PESWiki Featured / Top 5 : Trends > Zeitgeist > Free Energy in 2011 Prepping to Take Off in 2012 - Though the year didn't bring as many technologies to market as I had predicted last year (due to "you're not ready yet, world citizens"?), great progress was made. We highlight the Top 5 of the year and mention a few stragglers from last year, as well as mentioning the "Hall of Shame". (PESN and BeforeItsNews ; December 31, 2011) Best Exotic FE : Nuclear > Cold Fusion > Rossi > Mainstream News > Cold fusion competition heats up
